news.title: eFootball 2024
news.description: The latest installment in the eFootball series brings new features and improvements with enhanced graphics and realistic gameplay.

news.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered
news.description: Experience the iconic Modern Warfare campaign remastered in stunning 4K with improved textures and visual effects.

news.title: Forza Horizon 4
news.description: Race through beautiful dynamic seasons in Britain with hundreds of cars in this stunning open-world racing game.

news.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
news.description: Follow Arthur Morgan's epic journey through the Wild West in this critically acclaimed open-world adventure.

news.title: Devil May Cry 5
news.description: The legendary demon hunter returns in this action-packed sequel featuring stylish combat and breathtaking visuals.

news.title: Mortal Combat X
news.description: Drop into the intense battle royale experience with up to 150 players in this free-to-play combat game.
